Bodega Bar & Kitchen - BODEG BAR & KITCHEN Home Menu About Us Contact Events Blog Reserve Table Menu Menu BODEGA BAR & KITCHEN Now Seating in our New Outdoor Back Patio ‚ÄúThe Hacienda‚Äù Hours of Operation Monday ‚Äì Thursday ‚Äì 5:00 pm ‚Äì 11:00 pm Friday ‚Äì 5:00 pm ‚Äì 2:00 am Saturday ‚Äì 11:00 am ‚Äì 2:00 am Sunday ‚Äì 11:00 am ‚Äì 11:00 pm Happy Hour From Monday, Tuesday, Thursday¬† 5:00 pm- 7:00 pm Wednesday, Friday ‚Äì 5:00 pm- 8:00 pm Saturday ‚Äì 3:00 pm ‚Äì 7:00 pm Sunday ‚Äì 3:00 pm ‚Äì 5:00 pm Brunch Hours Saturday & Sunday From 11:00 am ‚Äì 3:00 pm Monday ‚Äì Thursday, and Sunday kitchen stays open till 10:30 pm Friday & Saturday, we have a full kitchen cooking until 1:00 am CALL US Menu Reservations Menu items are subject to availability. For more info, email hi@bodegaphilly.com Bodega Bar brings you a tantalizing blend of Latin-inspired cuisine, unique handcrafted cocktails, and World House music to warm your soul. We are a restaurant made by locals for locals with a strong focus on community and accessibility. Join us and be transported to a place where destiny meets spontaneity. We offer lunch and dinner service Wednesday through Friday as well as brunch and dinner on Saturday and Sunday. Our menus are diverse, offering everything from snacks to large format tastings. Our beverage program has an exciting list of unique cocktails, distinguished wines, and beers from around the world. Contact Us Call Us WE ARE OPEN FOR OUTDOOR DINING EAT IN THE HACIENDA Previous Next Bodega Bar is open for Outdoor Cafe seating as well as our more intimate Hacienda Patio Dining. The Hacienda Patio is the perfect space to celebrate all your private functions, from birthday parties to bridal showers and everything in between, al fresco style. STAFF Owners:¬†Alex, Steve Vasiliadis & Georgios Karagiannis Head Chef:¬†Magdy Samoel Entertainment Director:¬†Chris Clark Marketing Director: Dany Rivera Bodega Bar is open for Outdoor Cafe seating as well as our more intimate Hacienda Patio Dining. The Hacienda Patio is the perfect space to celebrate all your private functions, from birthday parties to bridal showers and everything in between, al fresco style. STAFF Owners:¬†Alex, Steve Vasiliadis & Georgios Karagiannis Head Chef:¬†Magdy Samoel Entertainment Director:¬†Chris Clark Marketing Director: Dany Rivera Do you take reservations? FAQ Do you take reservations? We take reservations on occasion, but we encourage our guests to reserve their table by phone or online. It reduces wait times, and even when there‚Äôs no wait, you can let us know you‚Äôre coming and how many people in your group. Join it now from our front page! Can I bring my kids? We are more of an adult-oriented restaurant, and at night time it becomes a lounge/club environment. But bring them in for brunch on the weekends! Can I bring my dog? We can‚Äôt accommodate pets at this time, but we will consider it in the future as we expand to have outdoor areas. Farmhouse Eggs $9 Two eggs prepared your way, served with crispy bacon, golden breakfast potatoes, and toasted country white bread. 2. Chef‚Äôs Omelette $14 Craft your own omelette with a selection of garden-fresh vegetables, spinach, mushrooms, and feta. Choice of cheese included. Enhance with bacon or sausage (pork or turkey). 3. Signature Breakfast Plates ‚Ä¢Buttermilk Pancakes (2) ‚Äì $15 Served with your choice of bacon or sausage, or finished with house-made blueberry or strawberry sauce. ‚Ä¢Classic French Toast (2) ‚Äì $15 Thick-cut, dusted with powdered sugar. Served with bacon or sausage, or house-made blueberry or strawberry sauce. ‚Ä¢Belgian Waffle ‚Äì $16 Golden and crisp, with your choice of bacon or sausage, or house-made blueberry or strawberry sauce. 4. Avocado Tartine $12 Choose sliced or spread avocado on artisanal toast with arugula, cherry tomatoes, balsamic drizzle, and a sunny side up or fried egg. Add bacon or feta +$4. 5.  Wellness Breakfast Bowl $12 Arugula, quinoa, black beans, pico de gallo, avocado (sliced or spread), and an over-easy egg. Add walnuts +$2. 6. Bodega Green Salad $9 A fresh mix of arugula and spring greens, cherry tomatoes, red onions, walnuts, parmesan, and your choice of honey lemon vinaigrette or balsamic reduction. 7. Loaded Breakfast Potatoes $10 Golden potatoes layered with melted cheese and crisp bacon. 8. Yogurt Parfait Bowl $7 Creamy Greek yogurt with oats, topped with your choice of honey, strawberry, or blueberry sauce, and finished with walnuts or almonds. 9. Seasonal Fruit Plate $7 A refreshing trio of strawberries, bananas, and blueberries. 10. Market Mussels $18 Steamed mussels served in your choice of red sauce, white wine, or buttermilk broth with garlic and cilantro. 11. The Bodega Burger $18 Hand-crafted ground sirloin topped with cheddar, jalape√±os, signature bodega sauce, lettuce, and tomato. Add bacon +$4, avocado +$4. 12. Breakfast Burrito $9 Fluffy eggs with potatoes, pico de gallo, and cheddar wrapped in a warm tortilla. Add chicken or steak +$3. 13. Garden Vegetarian Sandwich $11 Saut√©ed mushrooms, peppers, tomato, onions, and broccoli on toasted bread. 14. Southern Fried Chicken Sandwich $15 Crispy fried chicken on a toasted brioche bun ‚Äì or elevate it, served atop a golden waffle. 15. Breakfast Tacos (3) $14 Corn tortillas filled with scrambled eggs, cheddar cheese, and your choice of bacon or sausage. 16.  Breakfast Empanadas (3) $14 Flaky pastry filled with scrambled eggs, cheddar cheese, and bacon or sausage. Add chicken or steak +$4. 17.  Huevos Rancheros $14 Crispy tortillas layered with black beans, avocado, pico de gallo, cheddar cheese, sunny side eggs, cilantro, and a touch of aioli. 18. Veggie Flatbread $9 Oven-baked with fresh vegetables. Add chicken or steak +$4. 19.  Bodega Breakfast Brioche $9 Toasted brioche with bacon, fried egg, and melted cheddar. 20. Classic Bagel Sandwich $9 Fluffy scrambled eggs, crisp bacon, American cheese, and signature bodega sauce on a warm bagel. Jacksonville Surf Camp and Paddleboard School - Surf and SUP lessons
‚Äì Jax Surf & Paddle Skip to content Close menu Home About Online Store Retail Store Instructors Surf Team Shop Lessons Surf Paddleboard Booking Kids Camps Surf Camp Beach Eco Camp Rental FAQ Contact Log in Instagram Facebook Pinterest Cart Close cart Free shipping On all orders over $100 Instagram Facebook Pinterest Jax Surf & Paddle Home About Online Store Retail Store Instructors Surf Team Shop Lessons Surf Paddleboard Booking Kids Camps Surf Camp Beach Eco Camp Rental FAQ Contact Log in Search Site navigation Cart Search "Close (esc)" View more Shop the Shop Jax Surf & Paddle SHOP Now Spring & Summer surf camp 2025 Registration Now Open Sign up Jax surf & paddle surf shop Bodega Bar + Coffee learn more learn to surf with Professional Instructors book a lesson instructor bios rental Surfboards to Bikes and Everything  for the Beach Rates and reservations Jacksonville Surf and Paddle is North Florida's premier Surf and Stand Up Paddleboard School, Surf Camp , and Beach Rental provider.¬† We offer a wide variety of surf , stand up paddleboard (SUP) , and fitness classes specifically designed to meet your individual needs. Situated near Jacksonville Beach in Neptune Beach FL., we are blessed with warm temperatures year round. With easy access to both the beach for surf lessons and the Intracoastal Waterway for SUP, your next lesson is just minutes away. "Any age and any stage!" No one is ever too young or too old to benefit from board sports. Whether you are looking for a private beginner surf lesson or advanced competitive training for your aspiring surfer, we have a class that's right for you. Come explore beautiful inlets and winding creeks with one of our monthly SUP Eco tours . Don't want to wait? All Jacksonville Surf and Paddle lessons and tours are available 7 days a week. Be sure to book early as availability is limited.¬† Is your little one ready for surf camp? Register you child with confidence knowing that we will take care of your child like our own. With certifications for every paddle sport we teach and CPR & First Aid Certified Instructors , Jacksonville Surf and Paddle is your Surf, SUP, and fitness headquarters in North East Florida. After your lesson swing by our newly expanded surf shop with everything you need for a day on the water or night on the town. Grab a cold beer or a mimosa at the bar while you sip n shop Apparel by Patagonia, Rusty, Flomotion, Katin, Sandals by Cobian, Freewaters, Hari Mari,¬† Swimsuits by Imsy, Rusty, Eidon, Bodyglove, Sunglasses by Maui Jim, Costa, Ray Ban, Knockaround, Jewelry by BeYou, 4Ocean, Pura Vida,  Kai Indie, Boards by Whisnant, Flowt, Starboard, Dolsey, Globe, Sun protection by SunBum, Surface, and Hemlock. Each year we make a difference in our community by offering fun and healthy activities for everyone to enjoy.¬† We are dedicated to providing a professional and safe learning environment for you and your family. We love what we do and our customers tell us it shows . Our lessons, classes, and training programs are designed to help you master board fundamentals and to lay a foundation for a more healthy and active lifestyle. We invite you to learn more about class options using the links below or the navigation bar above. You can also search class and lesson availability with our on-line booking system .¬† Private surf or stand up paddleboard groups can be scheduled anytime. Summer Surf Camp May26th thru August 8th.¬† Lessons and classes are held in or near Neptune Beach, Florida just north of Jacksonville Beach. Please view our full service list for retreats, surfing, stand up paddleboard (SUP), surf camp, fitness, and rentals .¬† Ready to Book? Have a Question? Call us 7 days a week 9am-9pm at 904-372-9083 to speak to one of our staff. We look forward to serving you in 2025! About Us | Bodega Coffee Company | Bodega Coffee Company ‚ÄúTaste of Excellence‚Äù ¬Æ Bodega Coffee Company Sign in Create account Coffee Fair Trade Organic Medium Roasts Dark Roasts Espresso Decaf Coffee Supplies Tea Organic Teas Green Teas Black Teas Herbal Teas Be a Partner About Contact Navigation Menu Coffee Fair Trade Organic Medium Roasts Dark Roasts Espresso Decaf Coffee Supplies Tea Organic Teas Green Teas Black Teas Herbal Teas Be a Partner About Contact Sign in Create account About Us 35+ Years of delivering freshly roasted quality coffee to our Customers We started as a 1-person business in San Rafael, CA and have grown to meet the demand of great tasting coffee that coffee lovers prefer. We have fresh roasted gourmet coffee... you will be happy that you gave our coffee a try! The best 100% Arabica beans harvested from framers in the best coffee-growing regions of the world. Much of our offering is certified Fair-Trade Organic FROM the premium PARTS of the world. Our Petaluma Roaster has the best equipment to ensure each roast and grind is exactly what is needed to provide a clean-tasting coffee, bursting with the full flavor of the bean. This KEEPS every cup of coffee as amazing as the first. Bodega Coffee Company has been offering quality gourmet coffee for over 35 years. We focus on maintaining consistent great tasting coffee that coffee lovers prefer. All of coffee is roasted by an EXPERIENCED staff in Petaluma California that takes pride in their work. We hope you enjoy what Bodega Coffee Company has to offer. Our customers love US because we don't cut corners on taste...  JUST provide the quality water and brewing needed to serve your coffee drinkers... The Bodega "Taste of Excellence" Bodega Coffee Company Delivering the best coffee to our customers since 1985. Wholesale, Retail, Offices, Residential.¬† We deliver freshly roasted coffee beans at a fantastic price. Come taste the difference. Bodega Life ‚Äî Santiago's Bodega Menu Weekend Brunch Reservations Locations Bodega Life Contact Shop Reserve Table Back Visit Us Private Parties at Altamonte Menu Weekend Brunch Reservations Locations Visit Us Private Parties at Altamonte Bodega Life Contact Shop Key West Reserve Table Scroll About Santiago‚Äôs Bodega The idea for Santiago‚Äôs Bodega was born out of a childhood dream and a quest for adventure. Founder and Operator Jason Dugan knew he wanted to open a restaurant from an early age.¬†¬†His idea was to create an atmosphere where a welcoming staff would host a giant party each evening.¬†¬†Jason believed that a tapas-style dining experience could only compliment this vision, and would give guests the opportunity to taste a wide variety of dishes. Inspired by Ernest Hemingway‚Äôs The Old Man and the Sea , in which the main character, Santiago, closely links his life‚Äôs work as a fisherman with his own core values, Jason set out to turn this dream into a reality.¬†¬†¬†Continuing with the Hemingway theme, Key West, Florida seemed as good a place as any to begin this adventure.¬†¬†In 2004, armed with love and support from family and friends, and equipped with a trailer crammed to the brink of explosion, Jason traded Kansas City for the Southernmost City of the Continental USA. Two years of hectic hurricane seasons and the usual difficulties in opening a restaurant threatened to shut down the dream before it had a chance to get off the ground.¬†¬†But, like Santiago, the team persevered, and Jason‚Äôs vision flourished. Now, over a decade later, Santiago‚Äôs Bodega is the embodiment of Jason‚Äôs dream: a welcoming neighborhood restaurant where you can enjoy great food with family and friends who turn into family. Please take a moment to look around you and note the love and dedication that goes into creating each Bodega. Creative Director, artist Robert Henry Thompson, is responsible for not only the remarkable artwork, but also for the look and feel that so acutely defines Santiago‚Äôs Bodega.¬†¬†Under Robert‚Äôs leadership, the tables and bar have been built using reclaimed wood, the stained-glass doors have been uniquely pieced together, and the floors have been hand-laid.¬†¬†Even the outdoor signs are handcrafted, built by family out of wood harvested from an old barn at Jason‚Äôs childhood home.¬†¬†As with his food, Jason believes that building each restaurant from scratch provides a quality not attainable with ordering preassembled product. Stained glass and extraordinary flooring may help set a tone, but the staff at Santiago‚Äôs Bodega is, without a doubt, the number one reason for success.¬†¬†These team members are here to welcome you to our house, and to throw the best party each and every evening.¬†¬†Thank you for enjoying our neighborhood restaurant. The entire team wishes you good health and great food. Thank you for sharing. Bodega Life What is Bodega Life?¬†¬†It is approaching every day as a new adventure.¬†¬†It is ordering all the appetizers off a menu and making every dinner tapas-style.‚Äù¬†¬†It is hanging out with teammates on your days off.¬†¬†It is making friendships with both co-workers and patrons that last a lifetime.¬†¬†It is traveling to a different Santiago‚Äôs locations for lunch, even though they serve the same food at your location. Bodega Life is having somewhere to belong, no matter what color your hair, how many tattoos you have, or who you love.¬†¬†Bodega Life is being one of the Santiago‚Äôs Bodega family. Without a doubt, the team at Santiago‚Äôs Bodega is the backbone to our success.¬†¬†These team members are here to welcome you to our house, and to throw the best party for you each and every evening.¬†¬†Please take a moment to read through some of their stories below. Key Members of Our Team Jason Dugan Owner ‚Äì Santiago‚Äôs Bodega Owner and Operator Jason Dugan was born and raised in Kansas. An entrepreneur from a young age, his parents knew it was only a matter of time before his ideas took him far. As it turns out, Florida is not really that far from Kansas. But it was in the Sunshine State where, in 2004, Jason first opened the doors of his dream restaurant, Santiago‚Äôs Bodega. Jason brought over ten years of hospitality experience with him when he arrived in Florida, and not much else. Using ingenuity and approaching every problem as an opportunity, Jason turned his restaurant concept into the Santiago‚Äôs Bodega you know and love today. When not at the Bodega, Jason enjoys watching his son Jared perform on stage and his son Oliver play baseball creating larger-than-life bonfires, and dabbling in small-scale farming. Jessica Popovice Chief Financial Officer, Santiago‚Äôs Bodega Corporate Office Jessica is the nearly nocturnal CFO who prefers emails to phone calls and hates when people lose their receipts.¬† Jessica has worked with Santiago‚Äôs Bodega since 2006; it is her dream job, and she cannot imagine doing anything else.¬† Jessica graduated with a Bachelor of Business Administration from the University of Miami in 2006 and earned her Masters‚Äô of Professional Accountancy from the University of South Dakota in 2015.¬† She will complete her Masters‚Äô in Business Administration with special studies in Supply Chain Management in 2021.¬† In addition to being a giant nerd, Jessica enjoys spending time with her dog, Teddy No String, running, and creating all sorts of art. Tanya McMillan Beverage Director Tanya has arguably the best job at Santiago‚Äôs Bodega ‚Äì she gets to taste wine and decide which delicious varietals get added to our extensive wine lists!¬† Born in Tucson, Arizona, Tanya has called Orlando home for decades.¬† She began her wine training when she worked as a bartender, slowly familiarizing herself with vineyards, varietals, and vintages.¬† Since her bartending days, Tanya has traveled extensively with wine distributors to places such as Portugal, Argentina, California, and Spain to learn about the complicated process of wine production.¬† When not sipping and swirling during a wine tasting, Tanya enjoys Pilates, traveling, watching her son Jared preform on stage and her son Oliver play baseball. Jennifer Sanchez Executive Assistant, Santiago‚Äôs Bodega Corporate Office After nearly 20 years in the industry, Jennifer Sanchez knows the ins and outs of restaurant life better than most.¬† She started her service career as a hostess at Applebee‚Äôs before spending nearly ten years with Tijuana Flats.¬† (There is still a picture of Jennifer on the wall at TF‚Äôs so be sure to look for it whenever you are there next!)¬† Jennifer joined the Santiago‚Äôs Bodega family in 2017 and transitioned to the corporate office team in 2018. She is now an integral part of the efforts to coordinate the back-office operations for the Bodega family.¬† She enjoys getting to see the inner workings of the restaurants but HATES scanning receipts.¬† When not auditing files, Jennifer enjoys, music, time with family and beating the pants off everyone in Friends trivia. Tolibjon Karimov General Manager, Santiago‚Äôs Bodega Key West Tolibjon Karimov was born in Samarkand, Uzbekistan, and moved to Key West in 2008 with his family. Tolib is a graduate of Key West High School, where his favorite subjects were history and algebra. Tolib joined the Santiago‚Äôs Bodega Key West team in 2008, when his first employment contract was sealed with a fist-bump. Having worked nearly every position in the restaurant since that time, Tolib is now General Manager at our restaurant in Key West. Tolib is a celebrated two-time Top Tapa Award Winner, winning first in 2011 and again in 2015. He is very close with his family, and spends as much time as possible with his beautiful wife, parents, nieces, and nephews. Andy Tuttle General Manager, Santiago‚Äôs Bodega Orlando Andy Tuttle was born and raised in the rolling hills of the bluegrass state of Kentucky. Andy had several years of high-volume restaurant experience under his belt before starting with the Santiago‚Äôs Bodega family in Key West back in 2012. In 2015, Andy received ‚Äúthe call‚Äù to move to Orlando and serve as the General Manager of Santiago‚Äôs Bodega Orlando, which he happily calls home to this day. Drawing strength from his epic beard, Andy successfully navigates Happy Hours, Brunches, and everything else thrown in his path. His karaoke rendition of ‚ÄúGin and Juice‚Äù is the stuff of legend. When not at the Bodega, Andy enjoys competitive canoeing and making salads at home with his beautiful wife Daniel Rouffa Executive Chef, Santiago‚Äôs Bodega Orlando Bio Coming Soon Jeffery Cambridge Executive Chef, Santiago‚Äôs Bodega Key West Bio Coming Soon Join The Team Think the Bodega Life is for you?¬† We are always looking to grow our team!¬† Download our application and stop in at a Santiago‚Äôs location to speak with a manager.
